name: Improved Drag
text: You are skilled at dragging foes around the battlefield.
prerequisites: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.
benefit: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a drag combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to drag a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when an opponent tries to drag you.
normal: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a drag combat maneuver.
staminaText: When you are the target of a drag<sup>APG</sup> combat maneuver, you can spend a number of stamina points up to your Strength or Dexterity bonus, whichever is greater. Your CMD against that drag attempt increases by that number.
mythicText: You pull your enemies around the battlefield with great ease.
mythicBenefit:
You gain a bonus equal to half your tier on checks to attempt a drag combat maneuver, and to your CMD when an opponent attempts a drag combat maneuver against you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Drag.

Furthermore, you can make an attack of opportunity against any creature that attempts a drag maneuver against you, unless it also has this feat.
text_zh: 你擅长在战场中拖拽敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+1。
benefit_zh: 当你使用拖拽战技时不会引起借机攻击。此外，你所实行的拖拽战技检定获得+2加值。你还在对抗针对自身的拖拽战技时，CMD获得+2加值。
normal_zh: 当你使用拖拽战技时会引起借机攻击。
